definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: tassel, lock (√ dub,; NH id., so Targum [[חִיחִיתָא]], Syr. s.uws.iyto0; cf. Ar. na0s.iyah;un hair on forehead);—´[[ח]] abs. Nu 15:38, Nu 15:39 tassel on flowing ends ([[כַּנְפֵי]]) of garments, cstr. [[הַכָּנָף]] ´[[ח]] v:Nu 15:38 (v. Kennedy:Hast. DB ii. 69. FRINGES); [[ראׂשִׁי]] ´[[ח]] Ez Eze 8:3 lock of hair on forehead.
